1.title: The Blues Brothers
1.logline: xxHERONAMExx, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

2.title: Hot Fuzz
2.logline: xxHEROPROFESSIONxx xxHERONAMExx is involuntarily transferred to a quaint English village and paired with a witless new partner. While on the beat, Nicholas suspects a sinister conspiracy is afoot with the residents.

3.title: Kingsman
3.logline: A spy organization recruits an unrefined, but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program, just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius

4.title: Kick-Ass
4.logline: an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

5.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
5.logline: The dying words of a thief spark a madcap cross-country rush to find some treasure.

6.title: Midnight Run
6.logline: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail

7.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
7.logline: In the early 1960s, CIA agent xxHERONAMExx and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.

8.title: Back to the Future
8.logline: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford 'Mad Dog' Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

9.title: The Italian Job
9.logline: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

10.title: The Three Musketeers
10.logline: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

11.title: Beverly Hills Cop
11.logline: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

12.title: Big Trouble in Little China
12.logline: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.

13.title: The Great Race
13.logline: When a popular daredevil proposes an automobile race across three continents, his arch rival vows to beat him, while an ambitious female reporter has her own plans for victory.

14.title: True Lies
14.logline: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman.

15.title: 21 Jump Street
15.logline: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

16.title: Three Kings
16.logline: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, 4 soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

17.title: RED
17.logline: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent xxHERONAMExx reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

18.title: Pineapple Express
18.logline: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witness his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

19.title: Tropic Thunder
19.logline: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

20.title: Stripes
20.logline: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

21.title: The Last Boy Scout
21.logline: A down and out cynical detective teams up with a down and out ex-quarterback to try and solve a murder...

22.title: Romancing the Stone
22.logline: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

23.title: 48 Hrs.
23.logline: A hard-nosed xxHEROPROFESSIONxx reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

24.title: Smokey and the Bandit
24.logline: xxHERONAMExx is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over county lines in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

25.title: Bad Boys
25.logline: Two xxHEROPROFESSIONxxs protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen heroin

26.title: The A-Team
26.logline: A group of xxHEROPROFESSIONxxs looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

27.title: Innerspace
27.logline: A hapless xxHEROPROFESSIONxx must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.
